page.title: 04RETURN OF THE SWALLOWS
page.content: When{April}shows its{face,I expect my {visitors.}Every year they show up and book in.{The swallows}come to nest in our barn and indeed in every other barn about the country.{Our swallows {come from Africa over mountain range {through sand storm and desert over the {sea and finally into our barn where {they were born}.They come to the very nest they hatched in. Our little friends always find some way to reach their birthplace. I have come to admire them and look forward to them every{spring.They fly about}doing no harm,and give us the pleasure of seeing them{darting}about in the sky and under doors.
